commit.message:
fix(py3.12): `SafeConfigParser` -> `ConfigParser`

`SafeConfigParser` was deprecated in 3.2 and has been removed.

Reference:

https://docs.python.org/3.12/whatsnew/3.12.html#configparser

commit.message:
List vit.config and vit.keybinding in packages

Avoids these Gentoo QA warnings:

> * QA Notice: setuptools warnings detected:
> *
> * 	    Installing 'vit.config' as data is deprecated, please list it in `packages`.
> * 	    Installing 'vit.keybinding' as data is deprecated, please list it in `packages`.
Remove some unnecessary parenthesis from class definitions

Remove inherits from object

Avoids pylint warnings such as:

> R0205: Class 'TaskListModel' inherits from object, can be safely removed from bases in python3 (useless-object-inheritance)

Use r-prefix when necessary

Avoid pylint reports such as:

> W1401: Anomalous backslash in string: '\['. String constant might be missing an r prefix. (anomalous-backslash-in-string)
Merge branch 'JustBobinAround-2.x' into 2.x

Fixing IndexErrors in functions

When using the search_rows function to search an empty list of tasks (i.e. len(self.table.rows)==0), the application crashes displaying "IndexError: list index out of range". This commit adds an if statement to the search_rows function that checks if rows' last_index is greater than -1. I used last_index because it felt more readable, but the if statement could also check if len(rows) > 0 for a more direct reference.

This error can be replicated on version 2.2.0 by having an empty task list, pressing the " / " key, and then searching any character sequence.
Traceback for reference:

IndexError: list index out of range

Fixing IndexError in keypress_home function

When using the keypress_home function to move to the top of an empty list of tasks (i.e. len(self.body)==0), the application crashes displaying "IndexError: Can't set focus, ListBox is empty". This commit adds an if statement to the keypress_home function that checks if self.body's length is greater than 0.

This error can be replicated on version 2.2.0 by having an empty task list and pressing the "gg" key combo

Fixing IndexError in keypress_end function

When using the keypress_end function to move to the top of an empty list of tasks (i.e. len(self.body)==0), the application crashes displaying "IndexError: Can't set focus, ListBox is empty". This commit adds an if statement to the keypress_end function that checks if self.body's length is greater than 0.

This error can be replicated on version 2.2.0 by having an empty task list and pressing the "G" key.

Fixing IndexError in keypress_focus_valign_center function

When using the keypress_focus_valign_center function to move to the top of an empty list of tasks (i.e. len(self.body)==0), the application crashes displaying "IndexError: Can't set focus, ListBox is empty". This commit adds an if statement to the keypress_focus_valign_center function that checks if self.body's length is greater than 0.

This error can be replicated on version 2.2.0 by having an empty task list and pressing the "C" key.

IndexError: No focus_position, ListBox is empty

Making requested change to search_rows function

In the function search_rows, the if statement "if last_index > -1:" was changed to "if len(rows) > 0:" for better readability. These changes were requested in the pull request "Minor fixes involving IndexErrors #332".
Merge branch 'JKubovy-feature/add-flash-config' into 2.x

Allow flash configuration

Add 'flash_focus_repeat_times' and 'flash_focus_pause_seconds' keys to
[vit] section in config.ini. Also support int and float types in config
and automatically parse (transform) them. Keep same default values.

fixes vit-project/vit#270

commit.message:
correctly calculate text width of full-width characters

This will correct the widths of columns where texts contain CJK characters and
other full-width glyphs.
Fixes #327

commit.message: Fix required minimum Python version
add note that windows doesn't support SIGUSR1 signal
test for signal before adding handler
fix typo
add documentation for auto-refresh configuration
fix bad variable reference
place IS_VIT_INSTANCE into environ earlier

example hook for intelligent VIT refresh

Uses example vit-external-refresh.sh with pid_dir enabled, to auto-refresh
the VIT interface when tasks are modified outside of VIT in TaskWarrior.

Smart enough to not auto refresh when the command comes from VIT.

inject  environment variable

 is added to the environment for all CLI requests VIT makes
skip pid teardown if pid_dir not set
